name: SARSCoronavirus2SpikeAndNucleocapsidProteinStimulatedGammaInterferonPanel
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 Spike and Nucleocapsid Protein Stimulated Gamma Interferon Panel
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to the measurement of cell-mediated immune response to SARS-CoV-2 using an interferon-gamma release assay (IGRA).),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes terms related to the measurement of cell-mediated immune response to SARS-CoV-2 using an interferon-gamma release assay (IGRA).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes tests that detect SARS-CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferons but do not differentiate between the spike and nucleocapsid proteins)
